channel.name: Dubai One En AE
channel.title: King Richard
channel.desc: Sport, Biography, Drama 2021 With unwavering faith, Richard Williams dedicates himself to coaching his two daughters, Venus and Serena. He believes that their names would be written in golden letters in the world of tennis champions. This film received an award at the Oscar 2022. Will Smith, Saniyya Sidney, Demi Singleton, Aunjanue Ellis, Jon Bernthal, Reinaldo Marcus Green, Zach Baylin, Aunjanue Ellis-Taylor.
